name: command-gen
title: Command Gen
description: Generate CLI commands from natural language using AI
author: dq

commands.name: generate-command
commands.title: Generate Command
commands.description: Generate a CLI command from natural language

preferences.name: anthropicApiKey
preferences.title: Anthropic API Key
preferences.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
